amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 932, under the order of 7/30/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 23 - 70. Record Vote Number: 260.

action.text: Amendment SA 932 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S5287-5288; text: CR S5287) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 932 proposed by Senator Paul.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 932, under the order of 7/30/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 23 - 70. Record Vote Number: 260.
